SELECT count(DISTINCT f.FAVORITEID) FROM APARTMENT_FAVORITE f LEFT JOIN APARTMENTINFO i ON ( ABS(f.LAT - i.LAT) < 0.0000001 AND ABS(f.LNG - i.LNG) < 0.0000001 AND f.DEALAMOUNT = i.DEALAMOUNT ) WHERE f.USERNUMBER = #{userNumber}
AND i.ESTATEAGENTSGGNM LIKE #{region} || '%'
AND i.ESTATEAGENTSGGNM LIKE '%' || #{district} || '%'
AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(f.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) <= 50000
AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(f.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) > 50000 AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(f.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) <= 100000
AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(f.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) > 100000 AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(f.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) <= 150000
AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(f.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) > 150000

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, t.* FROM ( SELECT f.FAVORITEID as favoriteId, f.USERNUMBER as userNumber, f.CREATEDAT as createdAt, f.APARTMENTID as favoriteApartmentId, MAX(i.APARTMENTID) as apartmentId, MAX(i.APTNM) as aptNm, MAX(i.ESTATEAGENTSGGNM) as estateAgentSggNm, MAX(i.EXCLUUSEAR) as excluUseAr, MAX(i.FLOOR) as floor, MAX(i.BUILDYEAR) as buildYear, MAX(i.SUBWAYSTATION) as subwayStation, MAX(i.SUBWAYDISTANCE) as subwayDistance FROM APARTMENT_FAVORITE f LEFT JOIN APARTMENTINFO i ON f.APARTMENTID = i.APARTMENTID WHERE f.USERNUMBER = #{userNumber}
AND i.ESTATEAGENTSGGNM LIKE #{region} || '%'
AND i.ESTATEAGENTSGGNM LIKE '%' || #{district} || '%'
AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(i.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) <= 50000
AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(i.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) > 50000 AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(i.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) <= 100000
AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(i.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) > 100000 AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(i.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) <= 150000
AND TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(i.DEALAMOUNT, ',', '')) > 150000
GROUP BY f.FAVORITEID, f.USERNUMBER, f.CREATEDAT, f.APARTMENTID
ORDER BY f.CREATEDAT DESC
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(MAX(i.DEALAMOUNT), ',', '')) ASC
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(MAX(i.DEALAMOUNT), ',', '')) DESC
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(MAX(i.EXCLUUSEAR)) ASC
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(MAX(i.EXCLUUSEAR)) DESC
ORDER BY f.CREATEDAT DESC
) t WHERE ROWNUM <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNum} - 1) * #{criteria.amount}
